subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[break]]; to [[ruin]]; to [[destroy]]
# to [[rout]]; to [[drive]] [[out]]; to drive [[away]]; to [[banish]]
# [[broken]]; [[worn out]]; [[damage]]d
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[low]]-[[quality]]; [[poor]]; [[lousy]]
# {{lb|zh|slang}} to [[handle]]; to [[deal with]]; to [[do]]
#: {{zh-x|怎麼 破？|{{q|slang}} What to '''do'''?}}
# {{lb|zh|Sichuanese}} to cut open
